website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate kit for ear, nose, and throat surveillance. MacroView otoscope offers a twice as large field of view.
pros: Highly durable and function kit that covers all aspects of E.N.T exams
Features high-spec accessories and rechargeable handles with great battery life
MacroView otoscope offers a built-in LED and wide focal range
cons: A lot more expensive than other kits

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this set!
customer_reviews.text: I am so unbelievably disappointed. I invested in this set thinking if I spent the money now it would last. I was wrong. The kit arrived missing pieces and clearly having been used before. Do not order this set! I was shocked to learn it is not eligible for return. You have got to be kidding me! I honestly feel like I've been robbed.
customer_reviews.author: Four Boy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: In desperation to pass my class I bought this item. It does not charge or work at all. It serves me no purpose but to put my family in needless debit. I am so disappointed!!! Tried to return and was notified that it is not returnable. This information should be IN BOLD LETTERS!!!!!!! Purchase elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!! The othalmoscope came broken and Amazon won’t accept my request to return it. I’m a medical student and can’t even use it on my patients. Really really upset. Especially considering how expensive it is. Anything worth that much money should arrive in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn C. Degnan

customer_reviews.title: Received it "new" and otoscope never worked. This apparently ...
customer_reviews.text: Received it "new" and otoscope never worked. This apparently is now an authorized dealer of equipment - BUYER BEWARE. Would buy directly from manufacturer - they always stand behind their product
customer_reviews.author: AJG

customer_reviews.title: Handle and charger defective. Buy directly from Welch Allyn's website/store if possible instead.
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this product on Amazon. I did not full discharge and recharge the Li ion handle after buying to test, and realized it doesn't work after a few weeks. i.e. doesn't provide power to any of the heads. I contacted Amazon and they said it can't be returned to them since it is outside their return window and they asked me to get in touch with Welch Allyn directly. Hopefully the manufacturer rectifies this defective item. I have contacted them and am waiting to see what happens. Do not make a similar mistake buying an expensive medical professional item on Amazon! Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Firas Riyazuddin

customer_reviews.title: new well built product
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about my purchase due to some of the negative reviews but I made sure to buy it through Welch Allen instead of another vendor. Everything came in new packaging and it looks like a good quality product. It also appears to be in good working order. I think I will be pleased with my purchase and I look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan J.

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a rechargeable with an IEC plug type. We did receive a rechargeable handle or what seemed to be a rechargeable handle, however there was no IEC plug with which to recharge it!!!!! After spending a significant amount of money to buy the upgraded version so that we could recharge it we are now stuck with an item that is not able to do what it was advertised to do.
customer_reviews.author: Indira Maharaj-Mikiel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic set of great quality instruments. Switching to the panoptic is a great move when there is really a concern for eyes and you don't want to dilate the pupils. The Li battery is light weight compared to replaceable or Nickle based batteries. The set also comes with LED bulbs; this may be the best part. They last way longer and they are not as fragile as the standard bulbs. I have read some of the other reviews and cant say I had any issues. If I had any complaints it would be the lack of a place to store the recharging cable. This is a really small issue, but I added it for completeness.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: As expected the second time around
customer_reviews.text: Sold as a new product from Amazon the first one that shipped was obviously opened/used. The return went as expected and a new product was shipped but the whole process was a hassle that should have been prevented on the sellers end. The kit was as expected, way to expensive for what it is but that is to be expected in this industry.
customer_reviews.author: rjones1941

customer_reviews.title: Very sad and unpleasent
customer_reviews.text: I had the opportunity to buy this product. When checking the equipment, the battery handle of this equipment was not ushering. I didn't have the time to return it and it was my turn to buy the handle of this equipment again. I mean, It was my turn to pay almost $300 more, for something I bought as new. Very sad and unpleasant to pay for something new and that already since shipping by amazon, already comes useless. Oscar Archbold
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Archbold Núñez

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product in December 2018 for my girlfriend, at that time she was on vacation so the product was not in use until February when she restarted her semester. By April, 2019, the bulb was not working, and it would only last about an hour even after it had been charging all night. Because of the abovementioned, she has to borrow a diagnostic set from another student, this is unacceptable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nelcia A. Primus

customer_reviews.title: The price.
customer_reviews.text: Got everything hooked up and seems to be working fine. The recharger light keeps blinking and never totally goes off even after 24 hours of charging. I can tell that the charging is working its stays more green as it charges. I am building an adapter, 3D printer made, to hold my Galaxy cell phone so I can take selfie pictures while reviewing with the other eye that's not being tested.
customer_reviews.author: GoSolar2

customer_reviews.title: The material of this item appears weak and not fit to be used for what its designed for.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item as a Medical Professional, however the item appears cheap for its value and the contents are so fragile that most received damaged. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Lo

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the product is great!! the seller is very responsive and prompt i am very happy and i bought a second set the packaging was great seller always responded promptly
customer_reviews.author: munira

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Premium set with macro view Otoscope and Panopto. All pieces are new and function beautifully. Price was excellent and I’m satisfied with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Otoscope head defective. Returned for refund. Welch Allyn products are high quality and last forever. I plan to purchase a different Welch allyn set.
customer_reviews.author: Mema to two

customer_reviews.title: Great for non-ophtalmologist physicians!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a IM resident and I simply love the panoptic! Makes an otherwise suboptimal conditions of the ED, ICU and wards meaningless, it is easy to use and provodes amazing quality, the patients mostly refer being confortable with it
customer_reviews.author: AE3A

customer_reviews.title: Not sure the product was new.
customer_reviews.text: The box that product arrived in appeared used. This was supposed to be a new product, but the box and carry case appeared to have some use. This was not satisfactory to me due to the cost of the product, I expected it to be new.
customer_reviews.author: shop4fun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for school. Standard Welch Allyn quality: Nice and heavy, and works marvelously.
customer_reviews.author: ChicGeek

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished!!
customer_reviews.text: Is the best product on the market however mine was refurbished
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with set.
customer_reviews.text: It's a whole lot better than the previous set I owned. I can examine the ears and eyes much more clearly now.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: New, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: New in package. All works well with no defect of the light. Exactly what I’d hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: ponydr

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a great otoscope for at home use and using on children. Comes in handy, however, the otoscope tips that go on the nozzle are cheap and not as good as the Allyn and welch tips.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cerda

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed no problems so far, easy to charge
customer_reviews.author: Kara Mia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set for the office
customer_reviews.text: Great tools for use in the office. I use it all the time. I love the otoscope compared to traditional ones. It allows for a much better view.
customer_reviews.author: Wade G.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. I’ve tried recharging and searched for all trouble shooting but the light will not function and now I’m out hundreds of dollars with a defective piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good qualitt
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the case too much. But the contents as usual in Welch Allyn as a brand are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Voomie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect conditions
customer_reviews.text: I always love my welch allyn supplies, its my first time with this otoscope w magnifier and its amazing! Ophthalmoscope works perfectly as well, equipment got home in perfect conditions. I recommend this 100%!
customer_reviews.author: lugo

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product Experience.
customer_reviews.text: The opthalmoscope has a defect. When the larger spot sizes are selected there is a notch in the projected light. It's not a complete circumference.
customer_reviews.author: JTee

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the clarity and magnification. Very easy to use. The only change I would like is a space in the case to hold the tips.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Eccleston

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Believed this set to come with the cobalt filter, but arrived without it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gammel

customer_reviews.title: Missing necessary piece - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: My otoscope is missing a piece that makes it unusable. Do not order this product, this is a horrible mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Landmeier

customer_reviews.title: Welch Allyn, a great brand
customer_reviews.text: I really like these items, there help me to observe my patients better.
customer_reviews.author: Allan FAN

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I received the items except for the charger. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: NEIL ARJOON

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: We looked forward to this new chargeable product from WelchAllyn, it doesn’t work. It’s been plugged in for days and doesn’t work, extremely upset
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dalzell

customer_reviews.title: Why is this so expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Works will what it is meant to do. But I honestly with the price were much more reasonable. After I used this device multiple time, I really question why the brand manufacturer would charge so much for something like this. I would personally think $200 is more of a reasonable price for this, but even that is expensive in itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Welch Allyn Premium Diagnostic Set feat. Coaxial Ophthalmoscope, PanOptic Ophthalmoscope, MacroView Otoscope and Lithium Ion Rechargeable Handle
product_meta.description:
Style:PremiumOur Welch Allyn Premium Diagnostic Set includes our wide view PanOptic Ophthalmoscope head, a Coaxial Ophthalmoscope head, the Macro View Otoscope head and a Lithium Ion Rechargeable Handle in a hard, zippered case. Welch Allyn Lithium Ion Handles are lightweight and power 3.5 V Welch Allyn instrument heads for 120 minutes—twice as long as a conventional handle. The Welch Allyn Macro View Otoscope supports a bigger, better 2X larger field of view of the tympanic membrane with the widest focal range of any otoscope; built-in throat illuminator adds extra value.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
1-800-535-6663
feature_bullets: The Welch Allyn PanOptic Ophthalmoscope has a 5X wider field of view, allowing you fast, easy entry into the eye. The Welch Allyn Coaxial Ophthalmoscope represents the current model used on the USMLE

The Welch Allyn MacroView Otoscope supports a bigger, better 2X larger field of view of the tympanic membrane with the widest focal range of any otoscope; built-in LED throat illuminator adds extra value.Nose and throat illumination systems available
Welch Allyn Lithium Ion Handles are lightweight and power 3.5 V Welch Allyn instrument heads for 120 minutes—twice as long as a conventional handle
This product is intended for sale to and for use by Medical Professionals/Educators and students who are under the training or supervision of Medical Professionals/Educators
Learn and perfect the eye and ear exam with a trusted set of diagnostic equipment owned by 95% of US physicians. Our Premium Set includes two ophthalmoscopes—added value to help learn the eye exam

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
